definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_dies</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="is_equipped"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:CursedSkull</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">effect give @s royalrealms:skull_curse_effect infinite 0 true</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block><block type="entity_add_potion_advanced" x="72" y="231"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:SkullCurseEffect</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">99999</field></block></value><value name="ambient"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><value name="particles"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></xml>
